title: Removal of calcium from water by zeolites with gravity-driven membrane filtration for water treatment without electricity
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00438H, Paper
Dowon Chae, Kwang Pyo Son, Seung Mo Kang, Joowan Lim, Hosung Lee, Jin Lee, Seungjin Lee, Pyung-Kyu Park
Calcium removal from water can be accomplished by zeolite adsorption combined with gravity-driven membrane filtration. Zeolite size and Si/Al ratio significantly affect calcium removal and membrane filterability.
